dcterms:creator: Yuhao Zhang
Peng Qi
Christopher D. Manning
dcterms:description: The TAC Relation Extraction Dataset contains 106k sentences with entity mention pairs collected from the TAC KBP evaluations. Sentences are annotated with person- and organization-oriented relation types, e.g. per:title, org:founded and no relation for negative examples.
dcterms:title: TACRED

Stan Szpakowicz
dcterms:description: The SemEval 2010 Task 8 dataset is a standard benchmark for binary relation classification, containing 8,000 sentences for training and 2,717 for testing. Sentences are annotated with a pair of untyped nominals and one of 9 directed semantic relation types.
dcterms:title: SemEval 2010 Task 8
